attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Say no to supercasinos. 
Say no to increasing the limit on slot machines. 
Say no to encouraging internet gambling sites to come to the UK. 
Stop the myth that gambling does not ruin lives.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "halt the gambling expansion."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14677.asp

Prime Minister's Office
